website_summaries.verdict: The Dell XPS 10 Windows RT-equipped convertible tablet will truly last all day and most of the night (and certainly cover the longest flight in the world). It has a very small-capacity C: drive, but if your digital life is truly in the cloud, the XPS 10 can totally be the everyday computer that you carry everywhere.
pros: Over 20 hours of battery life with dock

customer_reviews.title: Good product but limits what you can do
customer_reviews.text: Is great product although very limited, can't install or add programs due to softwarw restrictions
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: We have bought Dell's before and they have always been fine and this is fine too, nothing special just fine. The tactility drives me nuts sometimes good sometimes poor. Cutting and pasting makes you want to throw it out the window and if you want to do some serious writing, ie completling a form on line, then you have to open the page in desk top or you have no hope and even then its variable. For just browsing the web its OK but you can't do without a lap top in addition to this tablet
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Dell & I
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a handy little gadget to have. At first I was disappointed because the main reason for purchasing it was to have another place to store my personal info. Well, it doesn't allow for home sharing and am not able to download some of my favorite online games. But that's what I should have known before buying it. In spite of these drawbacks, I have learned to find out what it is capable of and we've become friends. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tablet!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet. However, I don't recommend downloading Windows 10. It doesn't work right with it for some reason. Other than that, I have no complaints. Every so often it asks for a id code of some sort and the only way it disappears is if you plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lew

customer_reviews.title: iPad Convert
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Dell XPS 10 for my husband's birthday. I have an iPad which I have found to be somewhat restrictive. My husband and I have fallen in love with the Dell XPS 10 Tablet because it syncs seamlessly into our lives. No need to purchase programs and apps we'll only use once or twice. And the greatest part of owning the Dell XPS 10 is that it works hand in hand with the Dell computers we currently own! I'd recommend this product to everyone who wants a tablet at half the cost, but does 10 times as much as an iPad!
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Boyd

customer_reviews.title: I like the Kindle more but my mom has taken mine ...
customer_reviews.text: A different experience for sure. I like the Kindle more but my mom has taken mine so this is my test run. The full onscreen keyboard is a plus but navigation is a real challenge. I don't think its Dell's fault - I think Windows has a bit more work to do on tablet formats - like fix Start and figure out a better way to Pin websites. The tutorial is a joke - right? How about some real information?
customer_reviews.author: Peggy C. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS TABLET!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet!! I downloaded the 8.1RT update with no problem. I use it to take pictures and video and it really does well with Skype. Windows store is rapidly getting better, theirs not an app that I searched for that wasn't in the store. The desktop is not the same as full windows but it doesn't effect anything I do because if you download something it gets pinned to the start menu. The tablet comes with a micro USB connector witch I use to connect my external hard-drive to access my files and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Tablet
customer_reviews.text: A great item and a great price. I could not get it to work for me and kept adding items to help me but finally found I did not need it. (I'm 70 years old) But too late to return. Everyone told me it would be easy to use. Finally put it to good use and gave it to my daughter who knows how to use it. It was a great gift for her. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Clarence A. Butler

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: It has Microsoft Office 2013 comes with it. And bundled with the original keyboard with 2 USB ports, plus a micro SD card reader. A big advantage for this computer. I like it very much. But the window RT is really slow. It totally broken in only one and half year. Poor quality. I really don't think it worth my $490 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Rena Wang

customer_reviews.title: Tablet is really good, design and everything
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is really good, design and everything. special additional keyboard with all adapters an extra battery, last like all day Only bad thing is boring Windows8 RT cause you cant download and install programs from internet, just from STORE But for this money can't be better
customer_reviews.author: Milija

customer_reviews.title: another windows les than friendly user product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like not being able to use Mozilla. While the boys at Microsoft might think everything is so well organized, good lucking finding things that are not where they used to be. Much like Word, so much harder than easier to use with each new update. For casual users, it was more frustrating even if the graphics and images were superb. Returned it for an android version.
customer_reviews.author: DBStL

customer_reviews.title: Dell XPS 10 is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Despite the poor expert review on Windows RT, I really love this OS and the tablet. XPS10 is well built and responsive. It comes with the office suite, it is free with the RT. A 10 inch tablet that is cheaper than an Ipad mini. Wait, there is more. Windows RT can open multiple windows and change between different programs with a swipe. Windows 8 is a really good OS when use with a touch screen machine.
customer_reviews.author: Somerscrooge

customer_reviews.title: not the best or the worst
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the tablet everything was fine, until I was forced to upgrade to 8.1 and now unit freezes all the time, maybe it's not dells fault but Microsoft has issues with upgrade. Tablet does have very good quality display, vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: simple and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I was a laptop guy and did not get the tablet craze. I got this dell and it came preloaded with office which is awesome. I take it everywhere, it is small but clear and serves all the uses I need. Its not for gamers but serves me very well
customer_reviews.author: johnnyboy

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was excellent for the price. We added the keyboard, which extends the battery life. Unfortunately, this accessory was not available on Amazon at the time we purchased it. This tablet is phenomenal for the price. It's primary use in our home is for a student's on-line classes. We loved that Microsoft Office comes pre installed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Dell XPS 10 XPS
customer_reviews.text: i PURCHASED THIS FOR MY GRANDSON FOR HIS BIRTHDAY, HE HAD TOLD ME WHAT HE WANTED. AMAZON HAD THE BEST PRICE AND ORDERING WAS QUITE EASY. I AM NOT TECH SAVVY BUT AMAZON MADE IT EASY TO FIND WHAT I WANTED AND IT WAS EASY TO ORDER.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kohlet

customer_reviews.title: thank the seller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product and Acceptable and I would recommend it and thank the seller
customer_reviews.author: salah

customer_reviews.title: I love my 10
customer_reviews.text: I love my 10.1 Dell. My husband and I use it. It works very well I love how you can customize it and the way it looks like a computer on the go.
customer_reviews.author: ajmartinez

customer_reviews.title: First surface and like it.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend who wanted one for his daughter. There was a confusion on the cover as we thought it had a keyboard. Otherwise, was a great buy. Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Root de Passore

customer_reviews.title: WINDOWS really bad OS for this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as expected, WINDOWS operating is really bad, this leaves this tablet with no cool apps, that was really bad
customer_reviews.author: reset77

customer_reviews.title: My 10 liked it ok though
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. short of hard to use. My 10 liked it ok though.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Schalk

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Its good Right size, easy to use. Good battery life. Working great for me. I like the screen resolution and quality of the hardware
customer_reviews.author: Jaysheel Shah

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has everything I need for my business purpose. Fast and allows good production. The keyboard is the best one that I used on any touchscreen products.
customer_reviews.author: Johhny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived early and was perfect in every aspect. I bought it for my Mom and she loves it. It's lighter than a laptop and much more portable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas from NC

customer_reviews.title: ... even with the lesser version of Win8 still a great working device
customer_reviews.text: WOW worth every cent and even with the lesser version of Win8 still a great working device. Fast and fun
customer_reviews.author: Rarewein

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my Hubby
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. He hasn't quite mastered everything about it but getting there. He likes it, but time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Menge

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So far, we are very satisfied with our Dell Tablet. The screen resolution is excellent. All features are as promised.
customer_reviews.author: grammyb

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Received a comment from the user ( Given to somebody as a gift ) and she like it. Didn't hear anything bad since then
customer_reviews.author: Manuel P. Amargo

customer_reviews.title: The tablet did not work on battery, only worked ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet did not work on battery, only worked when plugged into the charger. I was not able to exchange and am currently waiting for a refund to clear before I can order another. This Is difficult since the purchase was to replace a stolen tablet. Now I am still without a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Skala

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble attaching my Bluetooth items to it. The machine wants passcodes that don't work when you have them. Other than that, I am getting use to it and have no trouble otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice hardware, can't recommend RT over the competition
customer_reviews.text: The 10.1" screen is great, and as much as I wanted to love Excel on a tablet, it's turned out easier to use Numbers on an iPad or a classic version of Excel on a laptop or desktop. Windows RT doesn't have nearly as much software available as the competing tablet ecosystems, and I don't find the Metro/modern interface as intuitive as the iPad or Android tablets. Dell made a good tablet, and Windows RT can be both fun and frustrating to explore on it, but for most people it comes down to software, and Microsoft is in third place for tablets. (On the bright side, this is vastly better than the old Windows CE tablets . . .)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rotation is not working within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this tablet on June 17, 2013 and was happy with the purchase initially. In August I noticed problems with the tablet's Rotation functionality (portrait to landscape mode when tablet is rotated); it freezes in the portrait mode. I had to restart the tablet to get this function working again. And now, I have to restart the tablet every couple of hours as the rotation function freezes frequently. This renders the tablet useless for me as I use it for reading eBooks. Please avoid this tablet if you can, even though the OS is good the hardware is not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: VIRAT K JETTY

customer_reviews.title: Dell XPS tablet
customer_reviews.text: Still working through initial stages and personalizing my system to my standards. Features are very well defined OS. I am wondering if there is a support website to continue my experience with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Xav 007

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for a few days but I have put many hours on it and have been using it for a while now and I am very impressed. It runs very smooth to me and I know I will find much great use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! Great for homework, school and general fun. Good job Dell. This thing looks sturdy and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Don Adams

customer_reviews.title: Dell XPS is a great tablet
customer_reviews.text: First time I've written a review because it is the first time I've been compelled to write one. I've been using the XPS for a couple of weeks and I love it. I used an Ipad 2 for a year and have an Android 10in tablet. The XPS is much, much faster than either one of those tablets and has a better screen. I don't find Windows 8 as intuitive as the apple or the android but as I get used to it I find myself liking it. Office Word, PPT and Excel apps are amazing and even better with the free 8.1 upgrade scheduled for October, the tablet will have Office Outlook email. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice tablet, a little confusing at first. I guess I'm too used to my iPad. Hubby loves it. Delivery time was as expected. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Leisa I. Oiterong-Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Blows Away the iPad!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet feels more sturdy and comfortable in your hand, it has a better screen configuration, and it is more productive for school and business....and it's a Dell !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S. Lehtio

customer_reviews.title: nice windows rt tablet
customer_reviews.text: Being a surface pro/windows phone 8 owner kinda knew what to expect. Nice tablet, little slow turning on. But runs smooth.
customer_reviews.author: mvolpe7111

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Lacking apps in the app store but they seem better everyday. Good battery life nice screen perfect size. Came with office which Was a plus
customer_reviews.author: dph

customer_reviews.title: Unit failue to shut down every time
customer_reviews.text: Unit fails to shutdown correctly. Shutdown process times out and restarts the tablet. I reload the software without damaging personal file, but problem returns.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Wellings

customer_reviews.title: Dellivered
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet ! I enjoy the different apps and the fact that you can add a SD card. Camera so so but ok.
customer_reviews.author: Coopm07

customer_reviews.title: is a good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Is a good tablet, is so fast, but sometimes is hard to turn it on, but in general is an excellent choice
customer_reviews.author: susana

customer_reviews.title: Tablet for Teezy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my Dell Tablet. It does everything I need to do and more. I am glad I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: So Far Its Great
customer_reviews.text: Dell XPS 10 Tablet has a lot of features many of which I have yet to use. It is definitely a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great product - overall
customer_reviews.text: The XPS is a great tool! Unfortunately, the windows 8 store can't keep up with market demands (like Android or Apple does). I bought it to work on a PhD when away from my study or office. That said, web applications bail me out most of the time. The device is great - win8 is not!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sigle

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic tablet with a nice long battery.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this computer/tablet. The battery lasts long enough for me. I have MS and this lasts long enough to help take my mind off my pain for the day. I love it so much. Just wish it had all the iPad apps.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Freedline

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet!!
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely one of the coolest tablets I've seen so far and it meets all my expectations. Good picture resolution and great features.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Paul Erreguin

customer_reviews.title: Had other tablets and this one is just fustrating!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is that this tablet often gets struck on web pages and you just have to close the page and start over again. Also trying to do stuff like Facebook on this is a pain, it won't let you do some things, it's just FUSTRATING!!!
customer_reviews.author: PoetRain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded my expectations and the operating system was perfect for doing my assignments...I absolutely love it...It is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Casserly

customer_reviews.title: OS is very complex for the limited usefullness.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased it I expected to be able to apps on it because it is windows based. After buying it I found I could not install magicjack. I was not informed that those types of apps are restricted. Buying it was something of a waste. I could just as well gotten a ipad because the apple OS is a lot more intuitive for the limited usefulness of the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Latuch Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a good tablet. The only problem I had with it was it was a day late on the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sandbox

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i purchase this tablet in May 2014 July 2014 not working I cannot return it . Help Helpi
customer_reviews.author: robbin tidwell

customer_reviews.title: A really neat machine!
customer_reviews.text: Really the easiest, handiest, and most convenient of my PC's to use. One can operate it in more comfortable seating conditions than either a desktop, or a laptop. Since I'm retired, I'm all about comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C Reep

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this tablet with Windows RT, I found out that it does not allow you to upload any apps. What's the sense in having a tablet of any kind that does not allow apps? Not even Windows 8 or Google Chrome! I am sorry that I bought this in ignorance. Windows RT is restrictive and as soon as I can clean it up and sell it, I am going to get another tablet; one that gives me freedom!
customer_reviews.author: JennaCee

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: The first Dell XPS10's Wi-Fi failed after a few hours of used the first day. Amazon was excellent about the return and sent me another XPS10. It also had its Wi-Fi fail after a few hours of the first day. I am returning it. I have wasted a lot of time setting up 2 machines and returning them through UPS. I have bought Dell for years, first problem ever. Maybe that is why Dell is in financial trouble?
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: On arrival this thing was broken..And thankfully Amazon gives no trouble for returns. We took it out of the box turned it on and it did work for about 5 seconds...Then black screen. It wouldn't even turn on while plugged directly into the wall! I would not recommend this product to anyone who wants something to work upon arrival!
customer_reviews.author: tina gardner

customer_reviews.title: No user instructions
customer_reviews.text: no instructions, am having a hard time using the tablet. Called Dell and they are supposed to get back with me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Surprised !! I was able to get the same tablet on eBay for less money ($50.) then Amazon must have been a holiday surcharge
customer_reviews.author: robertgambuzza

customer_reviews.title: You cant update Adobe Flash
customer_reviews.text: Youre un able to see Videos due to Adobe Flash and you cant update the new version it Sucks , just go witha Ipad
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work out of of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The tablet didn't work straight out of the box. The top half of the screen was blank and could only see the bottom half. Contacted Dell and they are sending a replacement. All of my computers are Dell so I'm disappointed in the Dell tablet quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

product_meta.title: Dell XPS 10 XPS10-3636BLK 10.1-Inch 64GB Windows 8 RT Tablet
product_meta.description:
Play hard and work smarter with the XPS 10 featuring Windows RT. Includes Office and apps from the Windows Store making it an ideal tablet for work and home. Optional mobile keyboard dock with additional battery gives you all-day productivity.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Dell XPS 10 Tablet with Qualcomm Snapdragon S3 1.5GHz DC processor
64 GB Flash Memory, 2 GB RAM Memory
10.1" High Definition (1366x768) IPS with Gorilla Glass

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars107 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
